content: Detail-oriented Business Analyst with 3+ years of experience in insurance and risk domains, supporting enterprise-level digital transformation and process optimization initiatives at S&P Global and Gainwell Technologies.

Skilled in gathering and translating complex business requirements into actionable deliverables including BRDs, FRDs, and SRS documents. Proficient in data analysis using SQL, Python scripting, and BI tools like Power BI and Tableau to drive insights, optimize workflows, and support strategic decisions.
I thrive at the intersection of business and technology, helping organizations streamline processes, reduce costs, and make data-driven decisions that deliver measurable impact.

highlights.title: Insurance Domain Expert
highlights.description: Deep expertise in underwriting, claims processing, and risk assessment across enterprise insurance systems.

highlights.title: Data-Driven Insights
highlights.description: Proficient in SQL, Python, Power BI, and Tableau to analyze data and create actionable dashboards.

highlights.title: Process Optimization
highlights.description: Track record of reducing manual processing time by 25% and improving workflow efficiency through automation.

highlights.title: Agile Practitioner
highlights.description: Experienced in Scrum methodology, sprint planning, user stories, and cross-functional collaboration using Jira.
